parameters.name: BgpGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the BGP group.

parameters.name: IsDefault
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the BGP group is the default one. Valid values:

*   **false**
*   **true**

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. The maximum value is **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region in which the VBR is deployed.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to obtain the region ID.

parameters.name: RouterId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual border router (VBR) that is associated with the BGP group.
